title: Ernesto Galli
text:
Ernesto Galli (25 July 1945 – 29 November 2020) was an Italian professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and coach.
Career.
Born in <a href="Venice">Venice</a>, Galli played as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> for <a href="Udinese%20Calcio">Udinese</a>, <a href="S.P.A.L.">S.P.A.L.</a>, <a href="Brescia%20Calcio">Brescia</a>, <a href="A.C.%20Cesena">Cesena</a> and <a href="L.R.%20Vicenza%20Virtus">Vicenza</a>.
After retiring as a player he worked as a coach, and managed <a href="L.R.%20Vicenza%20Virtus">Vicenza</a> between 1987 and 1989.
Death.
He died from <a href="COVID-19">COVID-19</a> on 29 November 2020, aged 75.
